reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan gorgeous and well-made, with lovely colors and a nice weight that makes it perfect for fall weather.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy, Comfortable & Colorful, but with No "Busyness" in the Print
items.body: I'm totally delighted with this sweater! It's a tight knit, so not bulky, but nice & warm. I'm 5'4 & 150 # with broad shoulders and relatively long arms, so I got a size large. It fits perfectly both through the body and the arms. It's comfy but not sloppy or boxy. For me the best feature of this sweater is the print which is a crisp, stylized floral on a cream/beige background. (No old lady vibes.) I absolutely love the placement of the roses in that, either by chance or genius styling, it has white or pale cream roses near the center-front of the sweater. That placement keeps the sweater from looking like a jungle of flowers (in which my face would get lost.) I don't see this as a seasonal sweater BUT it will look beautiful throughout all of sweater weather and especially festive at Christmas time. This is my favorite clothing purchase in quite a while! Read more
items.author: Mary Midwest Outwest

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect in every way
items.body: I can't say enough about how much I love this cardigan sweather. I layer it with accenting colors. It works well because it's lightweight; no overheating. The colors are so feminine, but yet bright and eye-catching too. I bought two on this same site, and I might just buy one more. It is soft too. I washed mine on light wash and laid it our flat to dry. I am sure that it could be dried in the dryer too. Read more
items.author: Sunflower

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely Cardigan
items.body: Very pretty sweater - I received a compliment on it the first time I wore it! The colors are vibrant and just as pictured. I gave it only four stars because the buttons and button holes are on the wrong sides. Typically buttons are on the left, but the buttons are on the right side of this sweater and closing it is somewhat awkward. I got it in a Small and it fits well. I'm 5'3" and weigh 130 lbs. Read more
items.author: Jo in LA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this Sweater!
items.body: I absolutely love this sweater. I ordered a size Large and it fits perfectly. It’s a nice quality. I’m 5’6” and 193 lb. for reference. It’s as beautiful as the photo. I bought the blue with the flowers. Read more
items.author: Diane

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Sweater
items.body: I wore this beautiful sweater to a Party and received so many compliments. So soft and comfortable! Read more
items.author: Jan Snelling

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Huge
items.body: Its very pretty but ginormous. Size small was like an xl. Read more
items.author: Mary

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Inconsistent sizing.
items.body: Whether I got a medium or a large size, the sleeves were way too long. Returning both, sadly, because I love the design. Read more
items.author: Jamesine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Floral Cardigan
items.body: Absolutely love this sweater. It’s a great weight, very good quality, super comfy, good style, has accurate sizing and comes in beautiful colors. I intend to buy at least one more. Read more
items.author: CDuke

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Green Pink Floral, Roses Print, Green Floral, Multicolor, Tulips Print, Lavender Print, Multicolor Green, Multi Green, Beige Floral, Sunflower Print, Mint Green Flowers, Green Flowers, Light Blue Flowers, Multi Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
